description:
11.97 fillborders
Fill borders of the input video, without changing video stream dimensions.
Sometimes video can have garbage at the four edges and you may not want to
crop video input to keep size multiple of some number.

This filter accepts the following options:

bottom.description: Number of pixels to fill from bottom border.

color.description: Set color for pixels in fixed or fade mode.

left.description: Number of pixels to fill from left border.

right.description: Number of pixels to fill from right border.

top.description: Number of pixels to fill from top border.

parameters.description: Number of pixels to fill from left border.
parameters.name: left

parameters.description: Number of pixels to fill from right border.
parameters.name: right

parameters.description: Number of pixels to fill from top border.
parameters.name: top

parameters.description: Number of pixels to fill from bottom border.
parameters.name: bottom

parameters.description:
Set fill mode.

It accepts the following values:

‘smear’

fill pixels using outermost pixels

‘mirror’

fill pixels using mirroring (half sample symmetric)

‘fixed’

fill pixels with constant value

‘reflect’

fill pixels using reflecting (whole sample symmetric)

‘wrap’

fill pixels using wrapping

‘fade’

fade pixels to constant value

‘margins’

fill pixels at top and bottom with weighted averages pixels near borders

Default is smear.
parameters.name: mode

parameters.description: Set color for pixels in fixed or fade mode. Default is black.
parameters.name: color
